mapper.select: SELECT p.ma_phong_ban, p.ten_phong_ban, n.ho_ten AS truong_phong, COUNT(nv.ma_nhan_vien) AS so_luong_nhan_vien FROM phong_ban p LEFT JOIN nhan_vien n ON p.truong_phong = n.ma_nhan_vien LEFT JOIN nhan_vien nv ON nv.ma_phong_ban = p.ma_phong_ban GROUP BY p.ma_phong_ban, p.ten_phong_ban, n.ho_ten;

SELECT ma_phong_ban ,ten_phong_ban ,truong_phong FROM phong_ban
WHERE ma_phong_ban = #{id}

SELECT pb.ten_phong_ban AS ten_phong_ban, COUNT(nv.ma_nhan_vien) AS so_luong_nhan_vien FROM phong_ban pb LEFT JOIN nhan_vien nv ON pb.ma_phong_ban = nv.ma_phong_ban GROUP BY pb.ma_phong_ban, pb.ten_phong_ban ORDER BY so_luong_nhan_vien DESC

SELECT p.ten_phong_ban, SUM(bl.tong_luong) AS tong_luong FROM phong_ban p JOIN nhan_vien nv ON nv.ma_phong_ban = p.ma_phong_ban JOIN bang_luong bl ON nv.ma_nhan_vien = bl.ma_nhan_vien GROUP BY p.ten_phong_ban ORDER BY tong_luong DESC

SELECT pb.ten_phong_ban, hd.ngay_ky, COUNT(nv.ma_nhan_vien) AS tong_so_nhan_vien FROM phong_ban pb LEFT JOIN nhan_vien nv ON pb.ma_phong_ban = nv.ma_phong_ban RIGHT JOIN hop_dong hd ON nv.ma_nhan_vien = hd.ma_nhan_vien WHERE hd.lan_ky = 1 GROUP BY pb.ten_phong_ban, hd.ngay_ky
